mapper.select: SELECT MEM_NO, MEM_ID, MEM_PW, MEM_NAME, MEM_NICKNAME , MEM_PHONE, MEM_ADDR, MEM_EMAIL, MEM_ENABLED, MEM_ROLE,MEM_IMAGE FROM LOGINBOARD WHERE MEM_EMAIL = #{mem_email}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LOGINBOARD(MEM_NO, MEM_ID, MEM_PW, MEM_NAME, MEM_NICKNAME, MEM_PHONE, MEM_ADDR, MEM_EMAIL, MEM_ENABLED, MEM_ROLE,MEM_IMAGE) VALUES(LOGINSEQ.NEXTVAL,#{mem_id},#{mem_pw},#{mem_name},#{mem_nickname},#{mem_phone}, #{mem_addr},#{mem_email},'Y','USER',#{mem_image, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
